verbose_text: In more current literature, that copper and zinc deficiency may both occur with silver poisoning has been commented upon.10 It is known that zinc and copper compete with each other for access to a common relatively weak excretion pathway and that excess oral zinc administration may cause copper deficiency anemia.11, 12, 13, 14, 15 It appears from our three patients, that infused colloidal silver has no significant excretion pathway, as the markedly elevated serum silver levels remained constant over many weeks.
